analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: The GMS score of 37 confirms a Defensive regime as momentum pushed the score down from 39. The primary driver is a sharp 18% spike in VIX (Fear/Volatility) and rising DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity), signaling tightening conditions. While equities and semis face pressure, stable yield spreads suggest this is volatility-led deleveraging rather than a systemic credit collapse. Caution is advised; maintain higher cash levels until VIX peaks and liquidity stabilizes.

reports.EN: The GMS score of 37 confirms a Defensive regime as momentum pushed the score down from 39. The primary driver is a sharp 18% spike in VIX (Fear/Volatility) and rising DXY (Dollar strength/Liquidity), signaling tightening conditions. While equities and semis face pressure, stable yield spreads suggest this is volatility-led deleveraging rather than a systemic credit collapse. Caution is advised; maintain higher cash levels until VIX peaks and liquidity stabilizes.
reports.ES: El GMS de 37 confirma un rÃ©gimen defensivo mientras el impulso empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n desde 39. El factor clave es el aumento del 18% en el VIX (volatilidad/miedo) y el fortalecimiento del DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar/liquidez), lo que reduce el apetito por el riesgo. Aunque las acciones sufren, los diferenciales de rendimiento estables sugieren que no hay una crisis crediticia inminente. Se recomienda cautela y mantener liquidez hasta que el VIX muestre signos de agotamiento tÃ¡ctico.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 37 mengonfirmasi rezim Defensif saat momentum mendorong skor turun dari 39. Pemicu utamanya adalah lonjakan 18% pada VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) dan penguatan DXY (Kekuatan Dolar/Likuiditas) yang memperketat kondisi keuangan. Meskipun sektor teknologi tertekan, spread imbal hasil yang stabil menunjukkan ini adalah deleveraging akibat volatilitas, bukan krisis kredit sistemik. Tetap waspada dan pertahankan posisi kas tinggi hingga VIX mencapai puncaknya.

Haupttreiber sind der 18%ige Anstieg des VIX (Angstindex) und ein festerer DXY (DollarstÃ¤rke/LiquiditÃ¤t), was die Finanzbedingungen verschÃ¤rft. WÃ¤hrend Aktien unter Druck stehen, deutet die StabilitÃ¤t der Renditespreads darauf hin, dass es sich um einen volatilitÃ¤tsgetriebenen RÃ¼ckzug und nicht um eine Kreditkrise handelt. ErhÃ¶hen Sie die Cash-Quote, bis der VIX seinen HÃ¶chststand erreicht.

Le moteur principal est le bond de 18 % du VIX (indice de la peur) et la hausse du DXY (force du dollar/liquiditÃ©), signalant un resserrement monÃ©taire.
